text: Ain Shams University (Arabic: جامعة عين شمس) is a university in Cairo, Egypt. It started in 1950. It was called Ibrahim Pasha's University. Its name was changed after the revolution of July 23, 1952. It has eight campuses. The university has more than 180,000 students. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official site Category:1950 establishments Category:20th-century establishments in Egypt Category:Buildings and structures in Cairo Category:Colleges and universities in Africa Category:1950s establishments in Africa Category:Islamic architecture
title: Ain Shams University
